meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the growth or spread of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The anticancer diet includes lots of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She took an anticancer medication to help fight the disease.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that eating broccoli every day was her anticancer secret.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude acted as an anticancer shield against the illness.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to support her in her anticancer journey.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that prevents or inhibits the growth or spread of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The hospital developed a new anticancer drug to treat patients.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are constantly looking for more effective anticancer therapies.
meanings.sent3: The anticancer treatment was like a superhero fighting off the evil cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the best anticancer remedy for everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of the anticancer vaccine brought hope to many families.
